thread.title: 3 actors to debut in Neetu Chandra's productional venture 'Once Upon A Time in Bihar'
thread.title_full: 3 actors to debut in Neetu Chandra's productional venture 'Once Upon A Time in Bihar'

title: 3 actors to debut in Neetu Chandra's productional venture 'Once Upon A Time in Bihar'
text:
3 actors to debut in Neetu Chandra's productional venture 'Once Upon A Time in Bihar' By The Hitlist Team | Posted 1 hour 
Actress-turned-producer Neetu Chandra and her brother, writer-director Nitin Chandra, are introducing three new talents -- Deepak Singh, Ajay Kumar and Kranti Prakash Jha -- in their upcoming Hindi film, 'Once Upon A Time in Bihar'. 
Ashish Vidyarthi, Deepak Singh, Ajay Kumar and Kranti Prakash Jha in 'Once Upon A Time In Bihar' 
The film, starring Ashish Vidyarthi, is slated to release on October 30. 
Neetu says, “The boys auditioned for their roles in the blazing heat but gave their 100 per cent. 
They have shot for the winter scenes wearing sweaters around a fire place in sweltering 44 degrees. They managed to make it look realistic.” Tags:
